amountToPayExceedsTheAmountThatsDue: Amount to pay exceeds the amount that's due
createYourStripeAccountDescription: Tyro Fees is powered by Stripe. Create your school Stripe account now in order to get started.
yourSchoolIsReadyDescription: Your school is now ready to start processing payments. We will be in touch shortly once Fees is ready for release.
clickSignUpToStripe: Click 'Sign up' to be taken to Stripe
thankYouForSigningUpForStripe: Thank you for signing up to Stripe
absorbFeesInformation: The school will absorb the service charge for this transaction
deleteFeeConfirmation: You are about to delete the fee "{{feeName}}". Are you sure you want to continue?
deleteDiscountConfirmation: You are about to delete this discount. Are you sure you want to continue?
publishOnlineDescription: You are about to publish the fee "{{feeName}}". Are you sure you want to continue?
unpublishOnlineDescription: You are about to unpublish the fee "{{feeName}}". Are you sure you want to continue?
cantDeleteFeeWithPayments: You can not delete this fee as payments have already been made.
